data.name: Chasing Tails - Tip the Dev
data.detailed_description:
Feed the Dev chicken (or fish)!

This "DLC" is meant as a way for the fans to support the developer and does NOT provide any additional benefits or in-game content.

If you're buying this - OMG THANK YOOOOOU! ☆*:.｡.o(≧▽≦)o.｡.:*☆
